Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for your vehicle care with cutting-edge technology.

preventive.title: Preventive Maintenance
preventive.desc: Oil change, filters, and general check-up.
preventive.longDesc: Our preventive maintenance service includes oil change with premium products (Motul/Toyota), air and oil filter replacement, fluid level check, and a 20-point visual inspection to ensure your vehicle operates in optimal conditions and prevent future failures.

diagnosis.title: Computerized Diagnostics
diagnosis.longDesc: We use latest-generation scanners compatible with OBD-II protocols and brand-specific tools (Toyota Techstream, JAC Diag) to read error codes, analyze live sensor data, and diagnose engine, transmission, ABS, and airbag faults with millimeter precision.

brakes.title: Brakes & Suspension
brakes.longDesc: Complete brake service: disc resurfacing, pad replacement (ceramic/semi-metallic), and fluid bleeding. In suspension, we inspect and replace shock absorbers, bushings, tie rods, and ball joints to restore your vehicle's comfort and stability.

alignment.title: Alignment & Balancing
alignment.longDesc: High-precision 3D computerized alignment to avoid irregular tire wear and ensure the vehicle maintains its trajectory. Complemented by dynamic balancing to eliminate steering wheel vibrations at high speeds.

toyota.desc: Certified experts in the leading Japanese brand. Serving Hilux KAVAK/REVO, Fortuner, Corolla, and more.

jac.desc: Specialized service for the modern fleet. We know your T8, JS4, and T6 better than anyone.

mitsubishi.desc: Maintenance for 4x4 legends. Montero Sport and Lancer in expert hands.

ford.desc: American power, precision care. Explorer, Super Duty, and Mustang.
